name: vzgcoders/tutelar-revived
description: ValZarGaming's offical Discord bot built in ReactPHP.

suggest.ext-uv: For a faster, and more performant loop. PHP >=7 only. Preferred.

suggest.ext-event: For a faster, and more performant loop
suggest.ext-mbstring: For accurate calculations of string length when handling non-english characters.
